attributes.action: Abolish All MP and Peer Profited Expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This must be done in accordance with the 'REAL WORLD' of expense claims which are to reimburse an individual for legitimate expenses incurred while doing his or her job.

This includes the abolition of 2nd home expenses.

Where residence in London is required, standard accommodation is to be provided and decided by plebiscite however, where this accommodation is deemed not to be suitable for the individual in question, they MUST provide for any alternative accommodation at their own expense again, in accordance with the 'REAL WORLD'.

This petition is hereby proposed and presented on behalf of the silent majority of British citizens.

Renaissance.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
